trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将其他类型的实例转换来回<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use a MatrixConverter to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> from an attribute string; use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Converters.MatrixValueSerializer> to create a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MatrixConverter 创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>从一个属性字符串; 否则使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Converters.MatrixValueSerializer>创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]表示形式<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>结构。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Converters.MatrixValueSerializer> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>
